blocked.heading: This page is not ready to publish. Before you can publish, check:

keywords.label: Profession that you are looking for

zeroResults.message: Your search found 0 professions. This might be because the profession you’re looking for isn’t regulated in the UK, or it’s listed under a different name.
zeroResults.listHeading: You may get more results if you:
zeroResults.relatedWords: use related words like nurse instead of nursing
zeroResults.sectorOnly: leave the profession blank and search by sector only

licensing.name: Licence
licensing.hint: By law, only recognised professionals can carry out reserved activities and use a professional title

certification.name: Certification
certification.hint: There are no restrictions on who can carry out activities, but by law only certified professionals can use a professional title

accreditation.name: Accreditation
accreditation.hint: There are no restrictions on who can carry out activities or use titles, but accreditation may demonstrate that individuals have achieved certain qualifications or experience
